content: g g g g g g e e e t t et e e r r r e e e b b b n r e t t s a u l p h p o y y b message from creator hai bubs i would just like to start by thanking you for choosing this free pattern crocheting and crafting in general is a huge passion of mine and i am glad to share it with all of you this pattern and plush has been made with all of my heart so i hope everyone respects the rules that i have laid out i can t wait to see all of your works don t forget to tag me<3 i also can t wait to make more patterns to share with you all and don t forget to always create with a smile with love quincy rules 1 no reselling or redistributing this pattern i worked really hard to make this pattern and i hope as fellow crafters you would respect that this is my design and would not take it as yours 2 please do not reuse my photos 3 no video tutorials on how to do this pattern there s one for this one already https //youtu be/0m-8mk86pyi 4 you can sell the finished product of this pattern but please don t forget to give proper credit 5 do not share screenshots or videos of this pattern except for the cover page 6 lastly have fun making it materials please do note that this pattern is adjustable so you don t neccessarily ahve to use the same materials as i do > yarn white acrylic yarn size 4 yellow acrylic yarn size 4 crochet hook 5 00mm for beret 5 5mm for ribbing skills and abbreviations please remember that if you do need help or you have any questions reach out to my instagram or facebook page and i ll do my best to answer them instagram @y o h plus facebook @yarn over hook skills abbreviations u s magic_ring single_crochet - single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet double_crochet increase - increase increase decrease - decrease decrease blo - back loops only sewing st/sts - stitch/stitches beret base start r1 double_crochet x 10 10 sts r2 increase x 10 20 sts r3 1 double_crochet increase x 10 30 sts r4 1 double_crochet increase 2 double_crochet increase x 9 1 double_crochet 40 sts r5 3 double_crochet increase x 10 50 sts r6 2 double_crochet increase 4 double_crochet increase x 9 2 double_crochet 60 sts r7 5 double_crochet increase x 10 70 sts r8 3 double_crochet increase 6 double_crochet increase x 9 3 double_crochet 80 sts r9 7 double_crochet increase x 10 90 sts r10 4 double_crochet increase 8 double_crochet increase x 9 4 double_crochet 100 sts measure your circle it should have a diameter of at least 9 to 9 5 inches feel free to increase or decrease to match the measurements the diameter of
